summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4747 construction of a trunk sewer along Rainier Avenue, from Henderson Street to Barton Place; and along certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, under Ordinance No. 54917, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
